title: Jewish Book Reactions Episode 2: ‚ÄúHere All Along‚Äù by Sarah Hurwitz
paragraph: Shalom, friends! Last week in my AMA, a self-described secular American Jew who wanted to connect more with their Judaism but wasn‚Äôt sure where to begin asked me if I have any recommendations. And guess what? I DO. Welcome to #JewishBookReactions Episode 2 ‚ÄúHere All Along: Finding Meaning, Spirituality, and a Deeper Connection to Life ‚Äî In Judaism (After Finally Choosing to Look There)‚Äù by Sarah Hurwitz! She covers it all - Torah, Talmud, prayer, life cycle rituals, the Jewish calendar - all the things! #judaism #jewishlearning

title: Jewish Book Reactions: ‚ÄúThe Madwoman in the Rabbi‚Äôs Attic‚Äù
paragraph: Shalom friends! Welcome back to #JewishBookReactions! title: Jewish Book Reactions: Torah in the Tarot by Stav Appel!
paragraph:
Shalom friends!
Did you know there are secret Jewish teachings hidden within the art of the #Tarot de Marseille cards, so that crypto-Jews could preserve knowledge of their traditions against destruction? I did not - but now I do! Welcome to #JewishBookReactions: The Torah in the Tarot, by scholar and cultural detective Stav Appel!
ALSO I am so excited to join Stav,  @JArtsBoston, and @ayinpress  for the book launch October 16! PERFECT FOR A VERY JEWISH SPOOKY SZN!
Register here: https://vilnashul.org/events/event/Torah-in-tarot?utm_source=popup&utm_medium=popup&utm_campaign=Torah-Tarot
